name: S T O P
description:
Made over the course of 2 weeks, "S T O P" is an experimental platformer, in wich I tried to emulate what it would be like to play an arcade videogame belonging to an alien civilization. Despite it's simple rules, the game features close to no explicit info about how to play it, resulting in an often confusing experience.

Instructions

Collect as many spinning blocks as you can. Whenever the level turns blue (after the 3 flashes), you must remain completely still to not die... Simple, right?

Controls

  • A, D - Move 
  • Spacebar - Jump
  • Spacebar (while in the air) - Stay Still
